title: Poetry of K.Y. Robinson: The Chaos of Longing and Submerge
description: The Poetry of K.Y. Robinson: The Chaos of Longing and Submerge is an audio collection of K.Y. Robinson’s work, including unabridged narration of her first two books, interwoven with author commentary and musical accompaniment. This bundled audiobook allows readers to access all of Robinson’s poetry in one place, and to gain insight into her development as a poet.
author: K.Y. Robinson
